releases.name: AmbientLights
releases.description: Ambient Lights is a mod intended to make interiors in the game brighter and more reflective of what's going on outside.
releases.changes: Fixed crash when entering Milton's church.

releases.name: RemoveClutter
releases.description: Mod that allows you to remove most of the clutter in The Long Dark scenes.
releases.changes: Initial release. Check README for info & tutorials.

releases.name: GearDecayModifier
releases.description: Mod for The Long Dark to modify decay rates of gear.
releases.changes: Added multiple categories of items. Added general/advanced controls for granular decay control.

releases.name: PlacingAnywhere
releases.description: This mod lifts placement restrictions and adds control for fine positioning and rotation.

releases.name: HouseLights
releases.description: Mod for The Long Dark that magically brings electricity back. You can turn lights on and off by using the light switches.
releases.changes: Enabled lights to allow crafting/reading when turned on at night.

releases.name: KeroseneLampTweaks
releases.description: Mod for The Long Dark that tweak kerosene lamps consumption.
releases.changes: Added RGB controls to lamp color

releases.name: WeightTweaks
releases.description: Mod for The Long Dark to modify item weights and carry capacity.
releases.changes: Fixed default value for Worn Clothing Modifier
